name: Secustry
description:
[Secustry]

Play as the lonesome WorkerBot3000 who works in the Secarmis Industry. People will come to you with orders and you gotta craft whatever they need.

Secustry is a Story-driven game with Overcooked-style gameplay.

[Controls]
Movement => W A S D
Pickup/drop => E
Throw => LMB while holding Item (LMB = left mouse button)


[Special Credits]
@Skvader for providing the Universe that this game is set in.
Check out his game for the Jam https://skvader-418.itch.io/shellshock
